contentrichtext.text: '''Yarmuk''' can refer to: *[[Yarmuk Jamaat]], an Islamic extremist organization connected to numerous terrorist attacks, according to the [[Federal Security Service (Russia)|Federal Security Service of the Russian Federation]]. *[[Yarmouk River]], one of the three main tributaries which enter the [[Jordan River]] between the [[Sea of Galilee]] and the [[Dead Sea]]. *[[Battle of Yarmouk]], which took place between the [[Muslim]] [[Arab]]s and the [[Byzantine Empire|Byzantine]] [[Roman Empire]] over 6 days in August 636. {{disambiguation}}
